text: Sharon Day is an American politician. She is the former co-chairwoman of the Republican National Committee. On August 3, 2017, she was confirmed as the next United States Ambassador to Costa Rica. She was nominated by President Donald Trump. She took office on September 25, 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography at GOP.com Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:Politicians from Texas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Sharon Day
